name: BanCheck
author: PhasecoreX (PhasecoreX#0635)
short: Check user accounts on gloabl ban lists.
description: This cog automatically checks users against global ban lists. You can also manually check users already on the server.
install_msg: Thanks for installing BanCheck! Unfortunately, this plugin does not do anything anymore since discord.services went down a while ago. Perhaps in the future it will come back up? Regardless, I will have to take some time and add new ban list sources.
